Posts.Content: Jun 23, 2012 07:51AM lhoffelder wrote: I started taxotere in March for stage lV breast cancer with metastasis in my back after 3 treatments all 3 lumps in my breast was gone. I have finished my chemo last Friday after 12 treatments, I have tolerated it well with little side effects some tiredness and very little nausea butÂ no loss of hair. Best wishes to you on what ever you and your onc decide.
Posts.Title: Need Input PLEASE!! Lynn1 K-Lo
